goal.ch: This course aims to help undergratuate students integrate information related knowledge and experience for Management Information Systems for research purposes.
goal.en: This course aims to help undergratuate students integrate information related knowledge and experience for Management Information Systems for research purposes.

outline.ch: “The objective of this course is to help students obtain comprehensive and contemporary knowledge for Management Information System research and applications.  Since communication is the basic skill for system analysis and maintenance, students are expected to integrate what they learn and to present relative MIS concepts or MIS cases in classes.  Class discussions and presentation are included in this class in addition to lectures.“
outline.en: “The objective of this course is to help students obtain comprehensive and contemporary knowledge for Management Information System research and applications.  Since communication is the basic skill for system analysis and maintenance, students are expected to integrate what they learn and to present relative MIS concepts or MIS cases in classes.  Class discussions and presentation are included in this class in addition to lectures.“

flexDiscription.ch: 第18週：課程相關領域線上諮詢 (optional)
flexDiscription.en: For Week 18, the instructor offers an optional online consultation session for students interested in diving deeper into related topics.
